Posts.Content: It's terror. I just went through stage 2. I went to 7!doctors. I could not believe in any of them they all did the same horrific treatments. I was given 3 months to start treatments or it would be too late. I read, researched and found a doctor that made sense. He explained THE GREECE BLOOD TEST to me and since insurance DOES NOT cover real cures I continued in a big hurry. Dr.forsyt he in Reno treated me with the Greece results and IPT chemo. I am completely well. I wrote a book about my healing. 174 Pgs I found a tiny hard lump,couldn't find any Dr. That would take it out. They only wanted to do biopsy. The lump was growing so fast while doctors did nothing but send me here and there. I went to CA (I'm in NV) and begged a friend of a friends doctor to take it out. Once it was out I has 3 months. Jumped off of a radiation machine, couldn't go through it! Left 4 different standard of care chemo facilities after seeing the.wither ing women. A sea of balding heads, pain sadness. Looked for the right answers. Suzanne's book gave me a list of Dr.s and the best for me turned out to be Dr. Forsythe in Reno. He understood my time problem and worked with me with great care and speed. I was right to have had the tumor removed, I was right not to have had radiation. I was right not to have standard chemo!!!!! I'm 74, in great health and want to share my cure. It was the hardest job ever. It takes great effort to find YOUR path. Your little voice will know when you find it.
Posts.Title: just got the bad news...

Posts.Content: http://www.amazon.com/Say-No-Radiation-Conventional-Chemo/dp This is the book I wrote about how I won my battle against breast cancer!!!!
Posts.Title: just got the bad news...

Posts.Content: No the surgery was the beginning. The Greece Blood test and IPT chemo (IPT is a lower dose chemo. They were the tools that killed my hormonal type cancer. I know of 3 doctors that use this treatment with additional tools Dr Forsythe in Reno and Dr. Juergen Winkler in Carlsbad, CA. Radiation and standard chemo are so destructive to bodies. Read and research. You will find the right path for you. Don't let fear keep you from investigating as much as possible. Good luck, you are a very young woman..

Posts.Content: On Nov 25, 2013 7:40 PM SpringFlowers wrote: Good for you!!!  Sadly,very few will do their own investigations in to alternative methods.  I was dx'd at stage 4 - thanks to a misread mammogram.  I should have been dead long ago, I did my own research, had laser surger to get the tumor out, it is necessary to always get the tumor out to stop the cancer cells from spewing into the body.  Not traditional surgery, LASER!  No pain, no cutting, no chance of cancer cells escaping into the body.  Guess we know, no one really wants a cure for cancer, it is the BIG money industry.  Stats show chemo/rad is little effective in treating cancer as opposed to ph therapy.  But, no cost there.  I had been given dire news, now, cancer free due to diet/ph/ and cesiumchloride. Lets hope more people will be willing to use their head rather than their ears to fight this scourge.  I'll never forget the one line I read that convinced me above all else: Doctors polled asked if they would take chemo if they were dx'd with cancer - 87% said NO.   Enough reason for me.  Good luck.  Simple remedies are the best, and....they work! Bless the heavens!! you are so very smart.  So many test results are "misread' they wanted to take of my daughters breasts-both!.  Completely wrong.  There was nothing there. I take my book to the canter centers and hand it out hoping to save someone the humilitation and pain that radiation and conventional chemo inflick on countless patients.  Its barbaric and just wrong. You are wonderful, keep spreading the word(s)!!
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Love the permanent lens! I can only suggest THE GREECE BLOOD TEST. It tells ALL.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Holy cow!  I'm 74.  If you read my book you will see how my daughter Jamie stayed with me through the entire nightmare. Thank you for the Doctors name, I will save it.  Keep up the fight and I am so so happy to meet you! If you are ever in Las Vegas let me know. We can celebrate our sanity! hugs
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Very well said. The extreme treatments re breast cancers need to be changed.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: On Dec 10, 2013 5:05 AM jesichashope wrote: The others are right, most DCIS stage 0 are just cells that are slightly abnormal and ofen disappear; we usually have many of these during our lifetime and history shows before the conventional industry got into their over treatment mode, doctors would watch these come and go in their patients. So now they want to over treat and over test - and in doing so they actually are creating cancer through mammograms and other invasive testing and treating. I have heard of some women that came to me where their doctors influenced them into having invasive surgery for DCIS stage 0. This is insanity - to cause cancer where there was none. And not to mention the ongoing side effects from unnecessary chemo or radiation too. If I were you, I would demand - ultrasound! The others are right - no mammograms. Thermography also will show things the mammograms do not.  I did a whole article on our blog regarding mammograms - it is not something you want to do when there are safer methods. With your side effects now - you need to strengthen you heart and liver, these are the two most common organs damaged through chemo, these are late effects that will appear at any time.  I would detox - sauna, green juice. Also add to your diet - Vitamin C - liposomal will get to your cells; about 2 grams of liposomal curcumin - best one is longvida curcumin. And use a whole food supplement like BioSuperFood. These are simple but potent measures. This should keep you in remission. Watch your blood through testing and if anything begins to appear - there are potent measures that will not harm you but will kick the cancer cells. For blood they have some good hyperthemia measures and put the blood through a magnetic process. So much new exciting things out there in corners of the earth that believe in cures. Great suggestions!
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: Stage 2 BC couldn't do standard of care in 2011. Found the Dr. That uses the GREECE BLOOD TEST and does IPT chemo http://www.amazon.com/Say-No-Radiation-Conventional-Chemo/dp Now I am cancer free!!! Just want to show victims another path. Mine worked. It was hard work but sure is worth it. I am 74 and better than before. No Premarin should be allowed. I took it for 35 years. There are a few wonderful doctors in CA, NV, that understand the doctors that only follow 'STANDARD OF CARE' are not doing their patients justice.

Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: It's a war. I read your story etc and see your passion. I feel like a drop of water in the ocean. So few listen and read deeply into information. They seem brainwashed by insurance companies the doctors and the media. All the foundations that seek cures. THE GREECE BLOOD TEST SHOWS THE CURES. IT'S THE HALLS OF KILLING. Going through the beautiful buildings and pretty doctors that might as well have hoods and Axeses. They almost had me talked into the frozen caps to save my hair and wanted me to have psychological counseling since I was resistant to conventional chemo! When being tattooed for radiation I got up from the guerny and ran out the door. I knew I had to run from all standard-of-care treatments. It's all about money. Donations should be for the real cures not the killing halls.
Posts.Title: I said no to rad&chemo

Posts.Content: http://www.amazon.com/Say-No-Radiation-Conventional-Chemo/dp Ran from standard of care. It kills and destroys . I found a doctor that sends patients blood to Greece for their test. With that exact information I began IPT chemo. Followed the test results to the letter and I left my stage 2 breast cancer bed and now at 74 I am healthy and still shooting baskets with my new basketball. Some of what I took-Haelan 951' DCA,& several other supplements. It's not easy, the most difficult path of my life. Now I just want to help others fine their healing path. The Greek test, IPT and running from 7 standard of care doctors saved my life.
Posts.Title: Platinum-Based Treatment of Triple-Negative Breast Cancer
